nodes.text: R2-S8 was an R2 series astromech droid with white, black and red plating and a black sensor. Like all R2 astromech droids, it stood 93 centimeters tall and was manufactured by Industrial Automaton. In 13 BBY, R2-S8 was present in Coronet Spaceport in Coronet City on the planet Corellia. Following a breach of the customs gates causing a security alert in the spaceport, R2-S8 was displaying a blue hologram from its holoprojector for a pair of Imperial Fleet Troopers when a nearby family of humans was forcefully separated by stormtroopers.

R2-S8 was created for the 2018 Anthology film, Solo: A Star Wars Story. The droid was first revealed prior to the film's release as part of a Star Wars: Droid Factory toy set produced by Hasbro Inc. earlier in 2018.
